"Is it impossible for one to close their own threads..?"

"Can I create a thread for a company although I don't have any partners?"

"How does one become a moderator?"

"Is there a place on the forums where all of this information is already located?"

Thanks

Yes, a moderator can.

No.

You don't.

Yes, [here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/30064-Community-Rules-July-24-2014).

> 
> "Is it impossible for one to close their own threads..?"
> "

Yes, but you can use [the request thread](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/25176), or use the Report Post feature.

> 
> Can I create a thread for a company although I don't have any partners?"

Not sure on the convention for rocket company threads. I'm not often on that bit of the forums.

> 
> "How does one become a moderator?"

Keep your eyes on the Announcements or Daily Kerbal subforum and wait for someone like Kaspervld or the SQUAD account to ask for moderator applications.

Be aware though, the job may not be what you think it is. It's a lot less of this:

![original.jpg](http://img.gawkerassets.com/img/17qgo22anjpxcjpg/original.jpg)

^*Judge Dredd*^

And a lot more of this:

![the-janitor-moments-the-janitor-1671883-576-432.jpg](http://images1.fanpop.com/images/photos/1600000/the-janitor-moments-the-janitor-1671883-576-432.jpg)

^*Janitor*^

> 
> "Is there a place on the forums where all of this information is already located?"

Not really, though you can use the forum search function or Google.

> 
> Thanks

Yer welcome!
